name: FleetPanda, Inc.
description: Developer of cloud-based end-to-end software designed to assist petroleum marketers who want to stop shuffling paper. The company's software includes tank monitor integration and auto-order creation which monitors all tank monitors, forecasts, and auto-creates orders and offers to refuel, maintain and wash various kinds of the fleet which are used for construction, delivery, landscaping, tour, and other purposes, enabling clients to save on extra costs and carry out their operations.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based end-to-end software designed to assist petroleum marketers who want to stop shuffling paper. The company's software includes tank monitor integration and auto-order creation which monitors all tank monitors, forecasts, and auto-creates orders and offers to refuel, maintain and wash various kinds of the fleet which are used for construction, delivery, landscaping, tour, and other purposes, enabling clients to save on extra costs and carry out their operations.
